body: These two books are part of a set held together with a leather strap. The covers are of a shimmering and unearthly blue leather, and the spines are built of silver and iron. The books are chilly to the touch, and staring at them induces minor vertigo.
name: Insights of Far-Seeing Taernis (Level 12 Conjurer)
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellbooks/Spellbooks/Insights of Far-Seeing Taernis (Level 12 Conjurer)

sections.name: Spells

sections.body: 4,555 gp (6,355 gp with the preparation ritual)
sections.name: Value
Preparation Ritual
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellbooks/Spellbooks/Insights of Far-Seeing Taernis (Level 12 Conjurer)/Preparation Ritual

sections.body: A creature you summon gains augmented defenses for a short time. Spend this boon effect as a free action when you cast a conjuration (summoning) wizard spell. The creature you summon with that spell gains a number of temporary hit points equal to your caster level, and as long as the summoned creature has at least 1 of these hit points, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus on saving throws.
sections.name: Sturdy Summoning
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellbooks/Spellbooks/Insights of Far-Seeing Taernis (Level 12 Conjurer)/Preparation Ritual/Sturdy Summoning
